title: Density Simulator
description: An interactive tool designed to help users visualize and understand the concept of density through simulations.

title: To-Do List
description: A Firebase-powered task manager designed to help users organize and track their schedules efficiently.

title: PureLeaf
description: A task management system for optimizing collaboration and task tracking within a company's supply chain.

title: Grocery Management System
description: A Command Line Interface (CLI) for managing employees, products, stocks, and sales in a grocery business.

title: Tsunami Prediction System
description: A machine learning model designed to predict tsunami events based on statistical and geophysical data.

title: Student Management System
description: A Command Line Interface (CLI) program to optimize the management of student data, including personal information and academic records.

title: Tetris
description: A pastel-themed twist on the classic Tetris game built with Pygame.

title: Modeling Infection Dynamics with Antibiotic Treatment
description: A mathematical model simulating interactions between sensitive and resistant bacterial populations under various antibiotic treatments.

title: Fake News Detection
description: Fake News Detection using Deep Learning Models (LSTM, GRU, RNN, Bidir-LSTM-CNN, Co attention)
